title: @RIOT is there an eta on the new player reform system for OCE?
body: Haven't seen anything after a bit of searching, just wondering if a rioter could give an update.

replies.body:
Hey guys, 

The latest update on the new player reform system for OCE is that we are one of the next regions to have it launched. See Riot Lyte's tweet here https://twitter.com/RiotLyte/status/606525714452627457

In the meantime, we have the following systems in place to address negative player behaviour, which you can read here (along with popular FAQs): 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq
dont hold your breath im guessing it will be rolled out next season maybe?
